website_summaries.verdict: Great-looking ornate design in a claw-foot tub faucet with a handheld shower.
pros: You'll love the porcelain handles that nicely contrast against the available finishes with this faucet, which include chrome, nickel, brass, and oil-rubbed bronze
Excellent flow rate in both the faucet and the handheld shower
Very good build quality in this faucet
cons: Needs nonstandard water supply lines that can be pricey

customer_reviews.title: No technical support
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to replace my ten year old filler with a new one. Should be an easy swap out. I'm having a small problem and have tried all afternoon (Thursday) to ask a simple question. I also dropped it and the lever for the hand shower broke. I don't see anything like it in their parts page. Not a very happy person at all right now. My tub is unusable and no Idea when it will be. Thanks, Kingston Brass. I really expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cosby

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April 2016. It is now February 2019 and I'm searching for a new faucet because this one is horrible. The handles constantly fall off (all 3) & now it is almost impossible to turn the hand shower off...it gets stuck. It was good for about 2 years, but I use this daily to bathe my 3 year old...and it hasn't held up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: kirolid

customer_reviews.title: Horrible faucet
customer_reviews.text: The cold lever would not turn off, the hose to the handle is completely blocked
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Prine

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: This has been one huge headache. I ordered this many months ago for a remodel I was working on. Once we got around to the plumber, he said there were parts missing. Apparently, there are 2 parts that mount on the outside of the tub to connect the supply lines too that are not there and he is unable to find them. He also stated that the supply line dimensions aren't standard and can't track them down either. Almost a year into the remodel and still don't have my tub.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Soutullo

customer_reviews.title: Replaced older model
customer_reviews.text: Item was a replacement of an earlier model. I did not have to replace the "thru bathtub wall" parts. It attached to 3 3/8 c to center design. I do not regret the price.
customer_reviews.author: saberback

customer_reviews.title: Quality and great price.
customer_reviews.text: This fits like a dream. My contractor thought this would cost us over 500.00. How happy I was to find it for much less and it's solid. We have been using it for 3 months and have had no issues and my plumber had no complaints installing it.
customer_reviews.author: SitaVita

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is junk, it constantly looses its handles and drops off and nicks the tub. No amount of tightening of set screws keeps it constant. The shatterin porcelain handles have to be replaced often. Just plain junk.
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: Some issues
customer_reviews.text: My handle on the hot water didnt fir properly I has an orange o-ring that was proud and that makes the handle loose. Also the one way valve on the sprayer stopped working after a week so I had to remove it. Overall its well made and I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous2001

customer_reviews.title: Almost $300. and you couldn't include the required washers?
customer_reviews.text: I thought it very peculiar that a plumbing fixture in this price range would be shipped without necessary washers. This meant that my plumber had to stop work while on the clock and go to a hardware store for a few inexpensive washers. This is not a positive endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Repetitive defective products
customer_reviews.text: Plumber confirmed the nut attached to this set was made 1/16 too big causing the washer/joint to burst causing flooding to three floors of our house. This was the replacement after we returned the previous one due to water leakage from the faucet. Terrible product that ultimately damaged our home.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the old look. Heavy well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bronze for our claw foot. It is awesome. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: kkt

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet! Looks so much better than the one the previous owner installed and is high quality. Ours lost a faucet handle right after we moved in and it wasn't repairable. It is worth a change!
customer_reviews.author: I96

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and rugged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and rugged. My plumber said it was the best faucet he ever installed in a tub. Wand is gentle but spout is strong. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shoestring Book Publishing

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my claw foot tub
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking mounted on our refurbished claw foot tub. Plumber installed. Quality made Attn to Manufacturer: It would be nice to have a valve on hand shower so you can adjust flow volume from hand piece.
customer_reviews.author: BamaRPh

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I got me a old clawfoot tub so I went with this faucet it looks beautiful and the price wasn't outrageous so I'm a Happy customer... Quality faucet don't look cheap
customer_reviews.author: fefe

customer_reviews.title: Order incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this faucet and it didn't come with the hot/cold/shower knobs! Second time this has happened when ordering Kingston Brass stuff on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: This looks amazing on our old clawfoot tub
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing on our old clawfoot tub. Seems to be good quality. We are very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DK136

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. I used PEX coming into the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. I used PEX coming into the back and I needed to double rubber washer it otherwise it slowly worked its way out!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Solid, hand shower is great!
customer_reviews.text: A substantial piece of equipment which mounts on the inside of our old tub. Elegant!
customer_reviews.author: R. Axel Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet! Shipped quickly! Hubby installed it the day after we received it and it works great. It really compliments the claw foot tub beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! Just what we were looking for!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased. Very easy to install, no problems and it looks gorgeous! Everything we wanted, its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and great looks.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for and at a very reasonable price. I'm a master plumber, but installation was easy enough for a DIY project.
customer_reviews.author: Rob F

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: While this might be a bit expensive, the quality of the work and the material is all worth it. Very heavy and very well built. The porcelain is just as nice as the faucet. Perfect replacement for any claw-foot tub. I would definitely purchase again and would definitely recommend Kingston brass fixtures to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C. Emig III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! Nice replica of a vintage faucet. Looks great in person. Works like a charm. Great company too.

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this! Especially the fact that the taps fit on an original claw foot tub. Not an easy thing to find in Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppinginsteadofstudying

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful piece and we hope we can receive a replacement
customer_reviews.text: The hand held hose literally broke off the second use. It was not stretched but appeared to have a weak attachment. It is a beautiful piece and we hope we can receive a replacement. The water faucet/knobs work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: within 6 months of buying this faucet it began leaking ...
customer_reviews.text: within 6 months of buying this faucet it began leaking. Almost impossible to find any parts to fix this. It is still leaking...arggg
customer_reviews.author: stephanie scoville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great in my bathroom, The spout is a little small but everthing works well.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: easy install. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my old clawfoot tub. Work well, easy install. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: bonnie kirby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the Kingston brass faucet! It creates the old fashioned look I was going for. Heavy, solid construction. Should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Story

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my faucet all parts were there and it looks great perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: YAK SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful addition to clawfoot tub. sprayer has a gentle spray, perfect to rinsing off my babe after bathtime.
customer_reviews.author: bon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Smooth action. A very attractive addition to our bath.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Well built faucet. Heavy bronze. Easy to install on my new tub.
customer_reviews.author: SirHarley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love. High Quality, beautiful faucets and hand shower. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice, solid fixture. Missing the handles, will need to call amazon. havn't installed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Allen P Willistein

customer_reviews.title: very nice item. the only problem is I called Kingston ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice item. the only problem is I called Kingston Brass company to find out about measurements and found them to be very rude.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: but looks fantastic! Looks like a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed yet, but looks fantastic! Looks like a high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly wittman

customer_reviews.title: A nice update to a vintage 24
customer_reviews.text: Oil rubbed bronze looks great with my black and white bathroom. I like to mix metals. And it is great with champagne gold
customer_reviews.author: kristen

product_meta.title: Kingston Brass CC10T1 Vintage Leg Tub Filler with Hand Shower, 4-3/4-Inch, Polished Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:Polished ChromeSolid brass construction for durability and reliability, Premium color finish resists tarnishing and corrosion, 1/4 turn ceramic disc cartridge, Vacuum breaker for backflow prevention, 3 3/8" center-to-center spread, Vacuum Breaker in Handheld, 3/4" IPS Inlet, Decorative hand shower included
feature_bullets: 3-3/8" Spread; Hot and Cold Labeled Porcelain Handles
Max 2.0 GPM/7.6 LPM Flow Rate at 80 PSI On Hand shower
Compliant with California Energy Commission Title 20

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars76 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
